div.p: Hello Roughneck Nation! We sure miss everyone! We do have some dates to announce in regards to awards and different ceremonies coming up in May. Below is a schedule of when certain videos will be released. We will upload a youtube link to facebook at these times and dates. They do coordinate with the originally scheduled dates for these events.

May 1st - 8th: Early Childhood, Pre-K, and Kinder online roundup.
May 11th: 7:00 PM Athletic Awards Video
May 15th: 9:00 AM HS Awards Video
May 15th: 7:00 PM Sundown ISD will do a facebook live drawing for prom gifts.
May 18th: 10:00 AM Elementary Awards Video
May 18th: 12:00 PM Middle School Awards Video
May 19th: 7:00 PM 8th Grade Promotion Video
May 29th: High School Graduation -- Still looking into the best way to do this. More details to come soon.

For all of these videos, minus the facebook live drawing a link will be posted to a youtube video. You can copy that link and share it with anyone in the world you think would like to see it. We know it's unusual and we certainly wish we could do it all live, but this is an opportunity to have this video available to you forever and more of your friends and family can get to watch it all this way.
